name: Archery Challenge
description:
Portfolio Website: https://travisenglandhewlett.wordpress.com/ 

First Project, UAL Level 3 Extended Diploma in Creative Media Production & Technology 

Developed From: 16th September – 4th November 2019 

Developed by: Travis England-Hewlett

Archery Challenge is an adaptation of the prevalent archery game format, with 12 levels positioning the player at different locations around the map and challenging them with hitting targets of accumulating difficultly. You as the player must control the angle and power of each shot in order to hit targets over different distances while avoiding the plethora of distinctive obstacles.
